text_logic_form: The line $AZ$ is equal to the hypotenuse of triangle $XZY$.
Find the length of the altitude of triangle $XZY$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $AZ$ is equal to the hypotenuse of triangle $XZY$.
Find the length of the altitude of triangle $XZY$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $XA$ is $5$ units.
The length of the line $YA$ is $9$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $Y$ and $X$.
The line $XA$ is perpendicular to the line $ZA$.
The line $ZA$ is perpendicular to the line $ZY$.
line_instances: There are lines $XA$, $YA$, and $YX$, forming a triangle $XAY$.
There are lines $ZA$, $ZX$, and $ZY$, forming a triangle $XZY$.
